unnormalised: Arrey yaar, cart abandonment? It's like leaving a perfectly good plate of biryani untouched! Did Sharmaji's wifi give up at 11:00 AM on 26/01/2023? Or did auntyji call right when you were hitting 'Pay Now'? Don't worry, we've all been there. That tempting kurta from Fabindia will be waiting, just like jalebis on Dussehra, even if you come back after 15/08/2024.
normalised: Arrey yaar, cart abandonment? It's like leaving a perfectly good plate of biryani untouched! Did Sharmaji's wifi give up at eleven A M on twenty six january two thousand and twenty three? Or did auntyji call right when you were hitting 'Pay Now'? Don't worry, we've all been there. That tempting kurta from Fabindia will be waiting, just like jalebis on Dussehra, even if you come back after fifteen august two thousand and twenty four.
